2. Each airport operator shall submit the floor-wise plan of SRA depicting the
area earmarked for pre-embarkation security checks, adequate movement area for
screened passengers and their baggage, evacuation route/passage area and area
for business establishments to BCAS. Thereafter, the Standing Committee will
examine the proposal, inspect the location and submit a comprehensive report to the
BCAS HQ to get one time approval of the Director General, BCAS. Subsequently, if
there is any change in the approved layout plan, fresh approval of the Director
General will be required after vetting of the Committee.
